Reviews.Title: just the thing
Reviews.Author: Cyrena Kellogg
Reviews.Content: This phone was everything I have come to expect from Casio and Page Plus was a dream to work with.

Reviews.Title: sturdy
Reviews.Author: LoveToShop
Reviews.Content: My husband is in the construction industry and needs a heavy duty phone.  This looks like a good one for the job. Ring tone could be a little louder - hard to hear over the surrounding equipment - but is ok.

Reviews.Title: This model can not be used as a pre-paid phon
Reviews.Author: michal fastow
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a prepaid one for traveling and to give guests. When i tried to program it both at Verizon store and by calling Verizon i was told this model is not supported by a pre-paid plan. Now I am now stack with a useless phone. Advertising this phone as a pre-paid one is simply a fraud.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Ryann M.
Reviews.Content: He has had this phone before and it is indestructible! Lost it in the snow one winter, found it the next spring and it still worked. Of course the battery life started to decrease, but that was pretty impressive. This phone is new enough that he can still download music for ring tones and so forth.

Reviews.Title: a cell phone we use and love!
Reviews.Author: Mark W. Cartwright
Reviews.Content: a good phone that will take a lot of abuse as phones do!  Reasonably priced and works well specifically for those in a rough type of profession for phones!

Reviews.Title: great phone!
Reviews.Author: Patricia C. Risner
Reviews.Content: Sturdy phone that doesn't require a data plan, but can be used with one . Inserting the battery is easy. The phone menu is straight forward. was set up and functional in less than 15 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: ernest moot sr.
Reviews.Content: great service & great phone, would highly recommend it to anyone. had lots of other phones & this is the one I like the best, thank you!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Bodandi
Reviews.Content: Looks sturdy enough, but it is an older model than I expected Think it will work fine for its purpose

Reviews.Title: Nice and sturdy
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Margerison "Robmars"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice sturdy phone that can withstand the elements and rough treatment. Great for those working outdoors or people who who drop their phone. A nice phone for kids.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: k
Reviews.Content: arrived on time and works great. I have ordered a lot of stuff from pink tech, and they have always been great to deal with

Reviews.Title: Decent phone
Reviews.Author: ferris
Reviews.Content: It is a decent phone for the price.  Everything works well on it.  My last casio phone had a better camera on it .  This camera is not that good.  The ring tones the phone comes with are left to be desired, but besides that it is compact and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: Lynnette
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a  birthday gift. It works great and is water proof which was needed in picking out a phone.

Reviews.Title: Crap of a phone.
Reviews.Author: jjcpper
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone and right out of the box it did not work. The charger did not even fit the phone. The speaker was awful. Could not hear anyone and it just stopped working. Not even like the picture described it. Not even the same color. It is a piece of crap. Don't waste you time and money just to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: All it's good for is making and receiving calls, can't send picture texts, can't set sounds or downloads as ringtones.

ProductInfo.Features:
Military Spec. 810F for: Water, Shock & Dust Resistance, Immersion, Vibration, Salt Fog, Humidity, Solar Radiation, Altitude, Low and High Temperature Storage. A-GPS LBS/plus compass
Internal antenna
T9 predictive text messaging
Streaming Video
Your purchase will include a Cell Phone, Rechargable Battery, and Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Casio GzOne Boulder Water Proof Black/Silver Camera Cell Phone Verizon or Page Plus Pre-Paid No Contract Required
